DOC.brief_summary: Primary : To evaluate pharmacologic effect single dose SAM-531 sleep EEG healthy subject .
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluating Effects SAM-531 Sleep Electroencephalogram ( EEG ) Quantitative Wake EEG Healthy Subjects
DOC.criteria: Men woman nonchildbearing potential age 18 50 year inclusive study day 1 . Body mass index range 18 30 kg/m2 body weight great equal 50 kg . Healthy determine investigator basis medical history , physical examination , clinical laboratory test result , vital sign measurement , 12lead electrocardiogram . Any significant cardiovascular , hepatic , renal , respiratory , gastrointestinal , endocrine , immunologic , dermatologic , neurologic , hematologic , neurologic , psychiatric disease . Clinically significant abnormal standard EEG screening . Consumption caffeinecontaining product alcoholic beverage within 48 hour study day 1 .
